description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB databases.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database create
commands.summary: Create an MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database delete
commands.summary: Delete the MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database delete --account-name MyAccount --name MyDatabase --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database exists
commands.summary: Checks if an Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB database exists.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database list
commands.summary: List the MongoDB databases under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database merge
commands.summary: Merges the partitions of a mongodb database.
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database merge -g my-resource-group -a my-account --name my-mongodb-collection

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted mongodb database within the same account.
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted mongodb database within the same account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb database restore --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--disable-ttl {false, true}]
                                     [--restore-timestamp]
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database show
commands.summary: Show the details of a MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
